Class HostIpv4Address

com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.common.net.HostIpv4Address
public final class HostIpv4Address extends HostAddress
An IPv4 address of a node of a network.

      public static boolean isAllZerosIpv4Address(String string)
      Returns a boolean value to indicate if the provided IPv4 address is an IPv4 address of all zeros.
      Parameters:

    • newHostIpv4Address

      public static HostIpv4Address newHostIpv4Address(String string)
      Returns a new HostIpv4Address of the provided IPv4 address. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the provided IPv4 address is invalid.
      Parameters:
      string - the provided IPv4 address
      Returns:
      a new HostIpv4Address of the provided IPv4 address
